code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{Button}from'react-bootstrap';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Product=_ref=>{let{category}=_ref;const[hoveredItem,setHoveredItem]=useState(null);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"position-relative overflow-hidden border border-gray",style:{height:'300px',backgroundColor:'#f8f9fa',cursor:'pointer'},onMouseEnter:()=>setHoveredItem(category.id),onMouseLeave:()=>setHoveredItem(null),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:category.img,alt:category.title,className:"w-100 h-100 object-fit-cover",style:{transition:'transform 0.4s ease',transform:hoveredItem===category.id?'scale(1.05)':'scale(1)'}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"position-absolute top-0 start-0 p-3",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h6",{variant:"primary",className:"text-light fw-medium m-0 text-uppercase fs-4",children:category.title})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"position-absolute bottom-0 start-0 end-0 text-center text-light",style:{transition:'all 0.4s ease',transform:hoveredItem===category.id?'translateY(0)':'translateY(100%)'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"dark",size:"lg",style:{borderRadius:"0",width:'100%'},children:" SHOP NOW"})]})]});};export default Product;
